meanings.sent1: The yacker in our class never stops talking.
meanings.sent2: My aunt is a yacker, always chatting away.
meanings.sent3: The yacker at the party told so many stories, we couldn't stop laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like a yacker, filling the room with non-stop chatter.
meanings.sent5: The yacker's words flowed like a river, never-ending and unstoppable.

meanings.sent1: The yacker of the construction site kept me up all night.
meanings.sent2: The thunderstorm outside created a yacker that shook the windows.
meanings.sent3: The yacker of the old car engine made everyone turn their heads.
meanings.sent4: The yacker of the waterfall drowned out all other sounds.
meanings.sent5: The yacker of the fireworks filled the sky with bursts of color and noise.
